channel.title: CVE Feed for Haivision -- Aviwest Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Haivision -- Aviwest Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-1965|2024-02-28T12:19:55.059Z -- Haivision -- Aviwest Manager
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery vulnerability in Haivision's Aviwest Manager and Aviwest Steamhub. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to enumerate internal network configuration without the need for credentials. An attacker could compromise an internal server and retrieve requests sent by other users.
